label: d'Udekem d'Acoz, Cédric & Sammy Degrave.  2018. A new genus and species of large-bodied caridean shrimp from the  Crozet Islands, Southern Ocean (Crustacea, Decapoda, Lipkiidae)  with a checklist of Antarctic and sub-Antarctic shrimps. Zootaxa 4392(2): 201–240.
